tweet: What is education in the process of thought and ideas? It is programming a way of thinking and being and what to think into fresh minds.
Education is the programming of values, ideas, norms and facts deemed by the institutions as worthy for transfer for homogenizing diversity.
By homogenizing diversity we create a basis for interaction and communication and control of populations of individuals.
While we say we celebrate diverse individuals, we strive via education, advertising, to standardize individuals to a uniform product.
That education gives us a common language and common ideas and forges the shape of various societies that all think the same way.
